sections.heading: Who Can Open
points: A single adult
Joint Account (up to 3 adults)
A guardian on behalf of a minor or person of unsound mind
A minor above 10 years in their own name

sections.heading: Deposits
points: Minimum deposit: Rs. 1000 and in multiples of Rs. 100
No maximum investment limit
Any number of accounts can be opened under the scheme

sections.heading: Maturity
points: The deposit shall mature as per the maturity period prescribed by the Ministry of Finance on the date of deposit

sections.heading: Pledging of Account
points: KVP may be pledged/transferred as security by submitting the prescribed application form with acceptance letter from pledgee
Can be pledged/transferred to the following authorities:
The President of India / Governor of the State
RBI / Scheduled Bank / Co-operative Society / Co-operative Bank
Corporation (public/private), Government Company, Local Authority
Housing Finance Company

sections.heading: Premature Closure
points: May be closed before maturity under the following conditions:
On death of a single or all account holders in joint account
On forfeiture by a pledgee (Gazetted Officer)
On court order
After 2 years and 6 months from the date of deposit

sections.heading: Transfer of Account
points: KVP may be transferred under the following conditions:
On death of the account holder to nominee/legal heirs
On death of account holder to joint holder(s)
On court order
On pledging the account to a specified authority

sections.heading: Note
points: As per Kisan Vikas Patra Rules 2019
